com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.util

类 URLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.util.URLHelper

  • public class URLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Miscellaneous static helper methods to help construct URLs with query strings.

    • 方法详细资料

      • parameterizeArray

        public static java.lang.String parameterizeArray(java.lang.String arrayName,
                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> items)
        Returns a string containing a URL argument list formatted for an array. This string may be appended to a base URL to provide array arguments.

        Example: 

        
     // itemList is a string array containing "One", "Two" and "Three"
     parameterizeArray("my_array", itemList)
     // returns: ?my_array[]=One&my_array[]=Two&my_array[]=Three
        参数:
        arrayName - Name of the array
        items - Array of strings to be contained in the array
        返回:
        A string with the array elements formatted as a query string

      • parameterizeArray

        public static java.lang.String parameterizeArray(java.lang.String arrayName,
                                                 java.lang.String[] items)
        Returns a string containing a URL argument list formatted for an array. This string may be appended to a base URL to provide array arguments.

        Example: 

        
     // itemList is a string array containing "One", "Two" and "Three"
     parameterizeArray("my_array", itemList)
     // returns: ?my_array[]=One&my_array[]=Two&my_array[]=Three
        参数:
        arrayName - Name of the array
        items - Array of strings to be contained in the array
        返回:
        A string with the array elements formatted as a query string

      • appendParameters

        public static java.lang.String appendParameters(java.lang.String urlBase,
                                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Appends a Map of name : value pairs to the end of a URL as a query string.

        Example: 

        
     // paramMap contains the following key / value pairs:
     // key1 : value1
     // key2 : value2
     // key3 : value3
     String result = appendParameters("http://my.site.com/getStuff", paramMap);

     // Result is:
     // http://my.site.com/getStuff?key1=value1&key2=value2&key3=value3
        参数:
        urlBase - URL to append the parameters to
        params - Map of name : value Strings to append as parameters
        返回:
        the URL with the name / value pairs appended as a query string
